ActorTalk: Hello, how may I help you?
You don't... look like office staff.
I'm currently being punished for getting into a fight. Just three days of community service, that's all...
I'm already properly reflecting on my actions while serving my punishment.
Besides, front desk duty? What kind of punishment is that supposed to be...
They said I have "interpersonal issues" and only know how to solve problems with my fists, so I need to develop my communication skills.
What's wrong with MY communication? That jerk is the one with the problem!
It wasn't the first time either! Multiple times! I caught that creep secretly following Kuroro around.
It looked suspicious, no matter how you slice it! I was just looking out for Babylonia's security.
And the result? Another disciplinary notice.
That's how I see you, at least. I believe more people will come to discover this side of you, eventually.
Mmm... Thank you. I feel much better now.
I'm sure you'll do well at the front desk, too.
Being attentive and vigilant is your strength.
